Author: ddmar
Text: Thanks <3 I keep trying to remind myself of that. it's easy to tell other people one bad weekend doesn't undo everything,  but it's so much harder to tell yourself that > . <

Author: Maroth
Text: Are you me? I just did the same thing. Weighed myself this morning and wanted to just give up. I hate the way Monday feels, like I can literally feel the weight in my gut and sitting on my hips.  You know logically that some of it is just water. Most of it is. Give it a few days to let your body process and work itself out. Try to be kind to yourself in the meantime. One bad weekend doesn't undo all the progress you've done. <3
